==Dialogue==
===Mirror Maiden's Journey===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When the player defeats one of Baobab's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow...
:'''Baobab:''' "Huh? That's it?"

;(When all of Baobab's Character Cards drop to 4 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow!
:'''Baobab:''' "Now I'm fired up!"

;(When Baobab defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow!
:'''Baobab:''' "That hurt, huh?"

;(When Baobab uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow.
:'''Baobab:''' "This is where I take charge!"
{{Dialogue end}}

===Mirror Maiden's Destination===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When the player defeats one of Baobab's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow...
:'''Baobab:''' "So this card got taken out, huh..."

;(When all of Baobab's Character Cards drop to 4 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow?
:'''Baobab:''' "Eh?"

;(When Baobab defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow...
:'''Baobab:''' "You thought I was still the same as before?"

;(When Baobab uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow!
:'''Baobab:''' "Now's the time!"
{{Dialogue end}}

===Stonehide Lawachurl's Rest===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When Baobab's Character Card drops to 8 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow?
:'''Baobab:''' "Is that all you are capable of?"

;(When Baobab's Character Card drops to 4 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow?
:'''Baobab:''' "Now we're talking!"

;(When Baobab defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow!
:'''Baobab:''' "Take this seriously!"

;(When Baobab uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow.
:'''Baobab:''' "My turn!"
{{Dialogue end}}

===Stonehide Lawachurl's Majesty===
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When Baobab's Character Card drops to 16 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow.
:'''Baobab:''' "Not bad."

;(When Baobab's Character Card drops to 8 Health or lower)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow?
:'''Baobab:''' "Guess you're much stronger than I expected, huh?"

;(When Baobab defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow...
:'''Baobab:''' "This is what happens when you don't take it seriously."

;(When Baobab uses an Elemental Burst)
:'''Baobab:''' Meow meow!
:'''Baobab:''' "This is the moment I've been waiting for!"
{{Dialogue end}}
